Name: require_team_status_active
Description: Only active teams can be assigned

Name: require_worker_status_active
Description: Only active workers can be assigned to tasks

Name: require_user_story_status_todo
Description: Only include user stories not yet started

Name: require_task_status_blocked
Description: Identify tasks currently blocked by issues

Name: require_sprint_status_active
Description: Only active sprints are valid for assignment

Name: require_skill_certified
Description: Only certified skills are valid for role matching

Name: require_velocity_trend_positive
Description: Only teams with positive velocity trend are selected

Name: require_scumb_board_active
Description: Only active Scrum Boards are used

Name: require_epic_status_open
Description: Only open epics are eligible for sprint planning

Name: require_stakeholder_relevance_high
Description: Only stakeholders with high relevance are included
